data.eml:eml: New species and a record of myrmecophilous mites of the families Neopygmephoridae and Microdispidae (Acari: Heterostigmatina: Pygmephoroidea) associated with Lasius umbratus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Western Siberia, Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaustov, Alexander A. (2016): New species and a record of myrmecophilous mites of the families Neopygmephoridae and Microdispidae (Acari: Heterostigmatina: Pygmephoroidea) associated with Lasius umbratus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Western Siberia, Russia. Zootaxa 4137 (3): 375-390, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.3.5
